C

CardinalDominoLine - Class in domino_project
This class represents a Specific DominLine used in CardinalGame of DominoGame according to its rules.
CardinalDominoLine() - Constructor for class domino_project.CardinalDominoLine
 
CardinalGame - Class in domino_project
This class represents the Cardinal Type of Domino Game.Its a MultiplayerGame played with a user and Bot(s)(1 or more).The player with the highest double tile starts playing first.The rule is that the touching sides of the tiles put on line have total sum of 7.The double blanks([0,0]) and the tiles with sum=7(e.g. [4,3],[6,1]) are considered baladers.They can be put anywhere reversed or not.Next to a 0 can only be put a balader.The players autommatically draw a tile from stack when they can't put any tile on Line UNTIL THEY CAN.The user can draw as many tiles as they want independently from being able to play or not.
CardinalGame(int) - Constructor for class domino_project.CardinalGame
Class Constructor.
CardinalGui - Class in Gui
This class represents the Graphical User Interface reffering to the Cardinal Domino Type Of Game.

changeLanguage(Locale) - Method in class Gui.i18n

checkIfFits(Tile) - Method in class domino_project.Board
This method checks if the specified Tile(tile) given fits on either side of the line of this board.It is supposed that if the Line is empty then every tile fits in it.
checkIfFits(Tile) - Method in class domino_project.BoardCardinal
This method checks if the specified Tile(tile) given fits on either side of the line of this board.
checkVictory() - Method in class domino_project.BoardSolo1
Checks whether we have a victory or not.If the panel is empty we have victory,otherwise we don't.
chooseNumberOfPlayers() - Method in class domino_project.UserInterface
Asks for number of players(1 User +Bot(s)).
